ctx: CargoX v Dubaju pobral nagrado za inovativnost in premagal Maerskov Tradelens
content:
Za nagrado so tekmovali s
TradeLensom, za katerim stojita Maersk in IBM
Maersk and IBM will wind down their global shipping blockchain
TradeLens after deeming the project a commercial failure.


shipandbunker.com/ne...-tradelens
author: crt
